title: Blizzard!
author: verias
text:
So, sorry for the delay, guys. J's been prepping for, and now snow attacked by this blizzard that's swept its way across Canada and the New England states of the US.

Hopefully we'll be able to stay up and on schedule during all this, but here's wishing J good luck with the shoveling and not throwing out his shoulders, lol.

Of note on the page: We get to see more of Chrys' robe from a couple of chapters ago, and also, seriously, who buys porn in this day and age?
